trans-unit.source: Represents the kind of event that has occurred on a view of a control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Reprezentuje typ zdarzenia w widoku formantu w czasie projektowania.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Ta klasa nie może być dziedziczona.

trans-unit.source: A ViewEvent object is provided to the designer component by the design host, for example [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], when raising an event caused by certain user actions on the design-time view of a control.
trans-unit.target: Obiekt ViewEvent został dostarczony do składnika projektanta przez hosta projektu, na przykład [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], gdy wywołanie zdarzenia spowodowane pewne akcje użytkownika, w widoku czasu projektowania formantu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName> event is handled by a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method, which takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName>Zdarzenie jest obsługiwane przez <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>delegować metody, która przyjmuje <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>obiektu jako parametr.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> class is a ViewEvent object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>Właściwość <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>klasy jest obiektem ViewEvent.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static ViewEvent fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>Delegować metody porównuje <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>Właściwości pola statyczne ViewEvent ustalenie, jakiego typu akcji zgłoszone zdarzenie.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: For example, an event is raised under the following circumstances: - You click a region on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Na przykład, zdarzenie jest zgłaszane w następujących okolicznościach:-kliknij region na powierzchnię projektu.

trans-unit.source: - The designer draws a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: — Projektant rysuje formantu na powierzchni projektu.

trans-unit.source: - You enter or exit template editing mode for a control.
trans-unit.target: -Wprowadź lub Zamknij tryb kontrolki edycji szablonu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>Klasa zapewnia domyślne pełnomocnika, aby obsłużyć <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Custom control designers override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> methods to process those events for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Projektanci kontrolki niestandardowej zastępują <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, i <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A>metody przetwarzania tych zdarzeń formantu na powierzchni projektu.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: The designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for the type of action on the design surface, and then passes the object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje host projektanta <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>obiektu dla typu akcji na powierzchni projektu, a następnie przekazuje obiekt do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>delegować.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates which type of action: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>Właściwość <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>obiektu wskazuje typ akcji: — <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>Właściwości dostarcza argumentów zdarzenia, które są specyficzne dla typu akcji.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a view event was raised for a click on a designer region.
trans-unit.target: Wskazuje, że Wyświetl zdarzenie zostało zgłoszone dla kliknięcie obszarem projektanta.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>delegować metody porównuje <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>właściwości statycznych <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>pola, aby ustalić, jakiego typu akcji zgłoszone zdarzenie.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is equal to Click to indicate that you clicked a region on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>obiekt jest taki sam, kliknij, aby wskazać, że kliknięto region na powierzchnię projektu.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>Klasa zapewnia domyślne <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>delegować.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If the event type is Click, the delegate calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Typ zdarzenia w przypadku kliknięcia, wywołuje delegata <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>metody.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method to handle click events on a region at design time.
trans-unit.target: Klasy wywodzące się z <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>klasy zastąpienie <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>metody do obsługi kliknij zdarzeń w regionie, w czasie projektowania.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The event arguments indicate which designer region was clicked, if any.
trans-unit.target: Argumenty zdarzenia wskazują, regionu, którego projektanta został kliknięty, jeśli istnieje.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Do dodania.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a view event was raised for drawing a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Wskazuje, że Wyświetl zdarzenie zostało zgłoszone dla rysowania formantu na powierzchni projektu.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>delegować metody porównuje <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>właściwości statycznych <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>pola, aby ustalić, jakiego typu akcji zgłoszone zdarzenie.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is equal to Paint to indicate a paint event on the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>obiekt jest taki sam Paint, aby wskazać zdarzenie malowania w formancie na powierzchni projektu.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>Klasa zapewnia domyślne <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>delegować.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If the event type is Paint, the delegate calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli typ zdarzenia jest Paint, wywołuje metodę delegata <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>metody.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> method to handle click events on a region at design time.
trans-unit.target: Klasy wywodzące się z <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>klasy zastąpienie <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>metody do obsługi kliknij zdarzeń w regionie, w czasie projektowania.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Do dodania.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a view event was raised for changing the template mode of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: Wskazuje, że Wyświetl zdarzenie zostało zgłoszone dla Zmienianie trybu szablon projektanta formantów.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>delegować metody porównuje <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>właściwości statycznych <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>pola, aby ustalić, jakiego typu akcji zgłoszone zdarzenie.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is equal to TemplateModeChanged to indicate that the template editing mode changed for a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>obiekt jest taki sam TemplateModeChanged do wskazania, że szablon tryb edycji zmieniony kontrolki na powierzchni projektu.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>Klasa zapewnia domyślne <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>delegować.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If the event type is TemplateModeChanged, the delegate sets the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli typ zdarzenia jest TemplateModeChanged, delegat ustawia wartość <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A>Właściwości.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Custom designers that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner> class can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> method to perform additional processing when the template editing mode changes for a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Niestandardowe projektantów, pochodzących z <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner>klasy można zastąpić <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A>metodę w celu dodatkowego przetwarzania podczas edycji zmiany trybu kontrolki na powierzchni projektu szablonu.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Do dodania.
